Description: Part of a limestone stela with black painted detail divided into three registers: 1 - Winged sun-disc above eleven(surviving) columns of Hieroglyphic text and two flanking figures(only left one remains). 2 - Sixteen rows of Hieroglyphic text. 3 - Row of Demotic text.
Curator's comments: E.A.E. Reymond, From the records of a priestly family from Memphis (ÄA 38) 1981: p.60-70, Pl.I . Maystre, Les grands pretres de Ptah de Memphis (OBO 113) 1992: p.389-392 cf. J. Quaegebeur, Chronique d'Egypte 49 (1974), 67 (no. 17). Published: Albersmeier, Unterschungen zu den Frauenstatuen, 138 n. 806.
